outcome: The Council adopts a hardline approach, increasing surveillance and control mechanisms.

events.description: The Council mandates increased data traffic monitoring, aiming to trace and control information flow.
Random BCI checks are conducted on streets, leading to protests and a rise in public dissent.
Military vehicles are seen patrolling major intersections, ostensibly to maintain order amid growing unrest.
Citizens report sudden restrictions on movement as new checkpoints are erected without prior notice.
